means: 炖，慢煮( simmer的现在分词 )
充满势将爆发的（怒气等）

sentence.Network_en: Meanwhile, melt the white chocolate in a bowl suspended over simmering water.
sentence.Network_cn: 同时，把碗置于微沸的水上，将白巧克力放入碗中使其熔化。

sentence.Network_en: Salt the stock to your taste and leave it simmering very gently.
sentence.Network_cn: 根据自己的口味给原汤加点盐，然后用文火慢炖。

sentence.Network_en: The province was attacked a month ago after weeks of simmering tension.
sentence.Network_cn: 在紧张局势连续数周恶化后，这个省于一个月前遭到了袭击。

PerfectNetExp.abs: Thailand ' s simmering political tensions also continue to threaten the nascent recovery ., 泰国日趋紧张的政治局势也将继续威胁逐渐复苏的经济.
do make sure the pan doesn't boil dry while simmering .文火煨的时候，要确保锅没有煮干。
This row has been simmering for months ., 这场争吵已憋了好几个月了.
Pour red wine and water into the pan simmering ., 再将红酒和水加入锅中煨煮.

list.abs: ...慢加热，用火时间一般较长，如炖栗子鸡（stewed chicken with chestnuts），煨牛肉（simmered beef）。“在水中煲是stewing in water,将食物放在水中煲，如广东肇庆的‘剑花猪肉汤’译为st.
英语词汇新译 S_翻译家(Fanyijia.com) ... simitar 弯刀 simmer down 被煮浓 simmer with 内心充满.
Y巴西木Y_新浪博客 ... a snap 小菜一碟 simmer down 别紧张，冷静下来 barge in 破门而入，没被邀请就来了.
汽车词汇 - 豆丁网 ... 平衡水箱 surge tank 变光开关 simmer switch 消音器 muffler.
simitar 弯刀simmer with 内心充满-

entry.def: When you simmer food or when it simmers, you cook it by keeping it at boiling point or just below boiling point.

example.ex: Make an infusion by boiling and simmering the rhubarb and camomile together...
example.tran: 将大黄和甘菊一起煮沸再用文火炖,熬成汤药。

example.ex: Turn the heat down so the sauce simmers gently.
example.tran: 将炉火调小，用文火炖调味汁。

entry.def: If a conflict or a quarrel simmers, it does not actually happen for a period of time, but eventually builds up to the point where it does.

example.ex: ...bitter divisions that have simmered for more than half a century...
example.tran: 酝酿了半个多世纪的严重分歧

example.ex: The gardener exploded with the rage that had simmered all morning...
example.tran: 花匠憋了一个早上的愤怒终于爆发了。

auth_sentence.content: While the stock is simmering, make the stuffing.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: While the stock is simmering, make the stuffing.

auth_sentence.content: Since the truce, a simmering stalemate has prevailed.
auth_sentence.res_content: Since the truce, a simmering stalemate has prevailed.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Since the truce, a simmering stalemate has prevailed.

auth_sentence.content: Set a steamer over a pan of simmering water.
auth_sentence.res_content: Set a steamer over a pan of simmering water.

Sentence.sentence: Simmering (难以平息的) resentment is seldom an aid to education.
